'''Tuala Uwoke''' was a [[Chultan (ethnicity)|Chultan]] jeweler for hire from the city of [[Neverwinter]], active in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: Tuala Uwoke hailed from the jungles of [[Chult]] on the [[Chultan Peninsula]], where she face some adversity, imprisonment, or [[slavery]]. After she was liberated, Tuala came across fascinating [[jewelry]] from the [[Sword Coast]]. She pursued the newfound passion for jewelry making way to the northern city of [[Neverwinter]], were Tuala worked on her craft and by the late 15{{th}} century, began offering her services to adventurers and defenders of the Jewel of the North.
